name: Vital Pressed Skincare Blurring Talc-Free Setting Powder
about: What it is:u00a0A weightless clean setting powder packed with protective, skin-refining actives for an instant diffused look and healthier-looking skin over time...Coverage:u00a0Light..Finish:u00a0Natural..Formulation:u00a0Pressed Powder..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Quinoa Seed Extract: Minimizes the look of pores and retexturizes the look of skin..- Vitamin C: Neutralizes free radicals, visibly evens tone, and supports natural collagen..- Probiotic: Enhances skinu2019s natural defense mechanisms...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: This is a micro-milled antioxidant veil that sets without diminishing radiance. This powder quickly smooths pores, visibly evens skin tone, and sweeps away shine while protecting from environmental stressors. Over time, pressed-in actives do more, working to absorb sebum and visibly refine texture....
ingredients: -Quinoa Seed Extract: Minimizes the look of pores and retexturizes the look of skin..-Vitamin C: Neutralizes free radicals, visibly evens tone, and supports natural collagen..-Probiotic: Enhances skinu2019s natural defense mechanisms...Zinc Laurate, Mica, Lauroyl Lysine, Silica, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Phytosteryl Macadamiate, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Enterococcus Faecalis, Butylene Glycol, Water, Hydroxyapatite, Zinc Oxide, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Extract, Chenopodium Quinoa Seed Extract, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Tocopherol, May-Contain: Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Red 30 (Ci 73360).....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Gucci Westmanu2019s Tips:.-A light-handed approach is best for applying powder..-Use this as your last step to set your foundation and boost wear, and throughout the day to refresh makeup..-Using Westman Atelier Powder Brush (sold separately), apply over makeup to set or on bare skin for sheer, diffused coverage..-Use the translucent powder as an invisible veil and the tinted powders as a sheer veil to visibly boost, blur, and even tone....Refill Product Instructions:.-This compact is refillable..-Replacement pans coming soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this to brighten and mattify, without. being too matte.  I also have the translucent but I prefer the pink bubble more as it adds more brightness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It wasnu2019t bad but I got the bubbles shade specially to brighter my under eyes and it didnu2019t look that great. I use a really light hand so I donu2019t think I was over applying. I just donu2019t think for the money, it should make my makeup look worse. Did fine for the rest of the face though. So if thatu2019s what youu2019re after go for it. But I wanted it to replace my Givanche PL powder in shade 3. This wasnu2019t it. Still searching.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this product, but it did not live up to the hype.  It dried out my under eye area so much it made them look so much worse.  I had much better results from the Huda loose powder. On other parts of my face it made no difference at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hate the packaging for this product. I have arthritis and had to fiddle w/this packaging to get it open. It annoyed me so much, I just threw it out.

reviews.review_title: A must have powder; WA make it refillable
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This powder is excellent- 5 stars for the product. 4 stars due to price and the fact that it isnu2019t refillable. I love the compact and the weight (I read it was based on a vintage Gucci coaster). Please make this refillable! refillable

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The powder is phenomenal - itu2019s literally the only powder Iu2019ve tried that doesnu2019t actually look powdery on maturing skin (looking at you Huda, Laura Mercier, Givenchy, MAC). But the packaging bugs me. Itu2019s unnecessary. Itu2019s heavy, slippery, and difficult to open. Also the compact is so small you canu2019t fit even a mini puff inside it, so not great for portability. I feel like Westman could put this powder in a much lighter compact with a bit more product, and knock the price down ($105 CAD is ludicrous - I bought bought  this with a rouge reward). The jacked up price is the reason for the 4 out of 5 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My first one was broken during shipment, and Sephora sent out a replacement so quickly. I really like the lightness and feel and smell of the product. I tend to not use powders and prefer creams, but this powder is formulated really well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Only powder that doesnt give me allergies near the eyes . I get itchy skin with all powders execpt this one , the chanel powder ,  and the laura Mercier mattifying compact powder.  I have tried dozens of powder all range prices and i would say this is my favorite by far. I use this one under the eyes over the tower 21 concealer and its holds perfectly but illuminates without any shine. ( you dont want shine when you have just ok skin texture and wrinkles) I work long shifts so thats awesome. The only bad thing is the price.. but   Th powder itself is PERFECT.

reviews.review_title: Must have for a natural, clean finish
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great for a natural airbrush look while still managing to look like skin. Itu2019s great for touchups and amazing for natural and light makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this and unfortunately it doesnu2019t work for me. Under the eyes it creases my concealer by 80% more than without, even with a thin layer. Too expensive for it to not work, so it had to go back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this and I also bought the brush. Both were an overhyped overpriced GIANT nope. Returned both products and honestly probably wouldnu2019t have kept them regardless of the price point. Lackluster to say the least.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this in store several times before pulling the trigger and purchasing and WOW. If youu2019re a makeup artist or desire a flawless, pore-free, airbrushed finishu2026 this needs to be in the basket asap! My favorite way to wear now is to finally seal the under eye - very bright and long lasting, even in humid summer weather! A must - HAVE!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, this isn't even a luxury product let alone efficacious. I didn't like it, because it didn't blur the undereye or any part of my face. By Terry is 1000 times better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Used this to set the WA Skin Tint and it definitely lives up to claims. Blurs the pores in my t-zone without making me look super matte. It does gives off a slight warmth to the skin so it doesn't turn me orange.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s OK. I like it, but I donu2019t love it.  I think there were others that are just as good out there that are much less expensive.

reviews.review_title: The Best Under Eye Setting Powder
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best powder to set under eyes! Incredible blurring with NO caked look at all! 10/10!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Like other reviewers, I found this compact very hard to open--there is no indent for your finger to grip the opening.  For this price, I don't expect a daily struggle.  It's also a heavy compact, too heavy for my purse.  I returned it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok so I bought this before my mini vacation. Absolutely beautiful. Luxury. Makes my under eyes pop and helps so my concealer doesnu2019t crease.!!! Worth every penny

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this product but it does not leave me face smooth, it is wildly expensive and it's SMALL. I can't imagine why anyone would keep this product.  It does not compare to my go to powder, ByTerry hyaluronic powder which is unbelievably smooth, and better value. even if they were the same price I would take the ByTerry, no competition. the only thing the westman has going for it is a nice compact, but even that is hard to open, need to use your nails. do you really want to chip your nails on over priced powder?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love most WA products. This one is a definite winner! It doesnu2019t irritate my sensitive skin nor does it settle into fine lines and wrinkles. It is blurring and takes away shine.

reviews.review_title: Don't let the pink color fool you. Works Great!

reviews.review_text: I was a little worried how this would look since it appears so pink in the picture. Definitely didn't disappoint! Worked well with my skin tone and helped to camouflage my oily T-zone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is absolutely stunning and the product does what it says! I apply around the under eye and upper cheek area. The product mattes the skin while minimizing the look of my pores. New fav.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Not worth the price at all, it didnu2019t do anything super to deserve this price tag plus the size is ridiculously small ufffc, I purchased it to set my under eye honestly it didnu2019t do much nothing u2026u2026.. that anyo

reviews.review_title: Nope not even remotely worth it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this powder.  It is expensive, but it seems to last.  It blends everything seamlessly into a soft blur that looks incredible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The item itself might be ok but the packagingu2019s impossible to open. It doesnu2019t have a grove that finger can easily dig into so its slipping out of your hands a bunch of times before itu2019s open.  Just miserable item.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s u2026 fine. But honestly the u201csebum powderu201d I bought off Amazon from some k-Beauty brand works better for way less money. Love the clean formulation, but this gets dirty and unusable pretty quickly.

reviews.review_title: A Must-Have in my makeup routine.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is an expensive powder and jt is so small but I really love this for my under eye area. I have tried many different types of powder and I find them to be too heavy for the under-eye so this js my favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased the pink powder to set under my eyes, and it works wonderfully. At 36, I'm not trying to bake my under my eyes, but simply keep my makeup in its place. It keeps my fine lines at bay (it won't make them disappear but it's not exaggerating them either). I bought this powder back in January 2023 and have barely made a dent in the compact -- so yeah, the price stinks but its longevity is worth it. It does not dry out my undereyes either.  Only downside is that the compact is difficult to open.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful fine powerful powder. My makeup stays forever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the ABSOLUTELY THE BEST SETTING POWDER I HAVE EVER USED! I will never use another setting powder again. It is worth every penny!! Need I say more?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant about the price but have tried other products from this brand and I will always have this in my arsenal. Itu2019s brightening, lightweight, great for under eye creasing! Just buy it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the pale pink, super fine powder that I have been looking for since I can no longer find the Channel pink pressed powder. I only use this lightly over my under eye  concealer and the corners of my nose. It should last forever which is good because itu2019s expensive. The packaging is small but beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The compact is a bit unnecessary, itu2019s hard to open and bulky. The product however is great! I use this just for under eyes and it sets and brightens beautifully! Itu2019s pricey for sure but I do feel like it will last quite a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Had hard times choosing between 2 and 3 stars to put for this one.  I have dark circles that makes me look tired, very annoying, so I have tons of this kind of a powders. Among all of them only Givenchy and this one does not crease on my dry under eye skin. However, if your skin is not extremely dry or mature I don't see any point of spending this much for so little product. Also, after just 2 uses the upper layer started to collect oils from the skin (even with dry skin and clean brush) and created that cement cover on top, I have it just for 2 weeks and uses overall maybe 5 times. Definitely wont repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Waste of money. Extremely small compact. Not even close to a normal size. Does nothing unique, in fact it has a bad smell. Not floral or perfume but a stinky foul smell. Will not be purchasing again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Not my favorite. Love that it has skincare properties and did fine setting my makeup, but little blurring and my face was so shiny after 20 min. I tried the Givenchy it was so much better.

reviews.review_title: Good but not really  worth the extra  $
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased  in pink bubble color due to all the hype, but was not overly impressed. HausLabs powder is better to me for overall skin blurring & under eye. Now I have 2 powders & use so little of them. Wasteful on my part.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is truly the best powder I have ever tried. I did not understand it the first time, because I applied it to bare skin. But now I am very excited. Even La mer is visible on the skin. And this powder is not noticeable and makes the face very smooth and fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: a product that works!! it's fantastic over my concealer...not cakey and stays put. no raccooning from anything...love the pink bubble. definitely recommend this beauty! fabulous ingredients too...no talc. easy to use with the Fenty concealer brush too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because one of my favorite Tik Tok beauty artists recommended. I don't mind splurging every once in awhile. However, I don't feel that there is anything extra special about this powder to justify spending this amount.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty good and the best I have found so far. Still not perfect, but better than the rest. Ridiculously expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good product. I enjoy using it. Just think the price is really high.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down my most favorite face powder- it should be called u201cperfecteru201d  with just a small amount, my skin always looks blurred and perfected - and it has skin loving ingredients, too. Win-Win!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For this price, I expected angels to come and apply it. It was average. So not worth $75. Iu2019d rather Huda powder over this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So finely milled, this is such a beautifully crafted product. I would have given it 5 stars but itu2019s really small and for that price I feel like it could have been larger. The packaging is luxe and really brightens.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So far everything from this line is perfect!!! I love my skin with this on.  I didnu2019t touch up and I looked natural not made up.  Iu2019m in my forties and this works!!

reviews.review_title: Did not reduce shine or set face
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this since I use their stick foundation but it did nothing for my oily t zone. As a matter of fact it seemed to take off my makeup after using it and didnu2019t reduce shine. For the price you think they would include a puff or brush.

reviews.review_title: Didnu2019t think a powder could be so effective!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Five stars ONLY bc itu2019s a great product. Way too stupid expensive but much to my happiness or chagrin, havenu2019t decided, Iu2019m keeping this! (I can hear my pocketbook sobbing in the background lol) I have more than a dozen good brand powders and Iu2019m never totally satisfied. This stuff? Wow. It airbrushes my face, especially under the eyes. And for me at 51, that is the impossible task. Disagree on difficulty in opening, have had zero problems with that, tho I know what people are talking about u2014 itu2019s a pain to open my Westman Atelier lip compact. No probs with this one tho.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Is it just me, or are Westman Atelier compacts the hardest compacts to open??... Love what's inside for the most part..but opening any of the compacts from this line is ridiculous. I recommend what's inside, but trying to get to it can be akin to pulling a cork out of a wine bottle by hand....

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For the price (and size of a MAC eyeshadow) I was expecting a quality product. This doesnu2019t mattify, blur, brighten or do much if anything. I like the compact, but $100? Yeah, itu2019s going back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin

Really don't understand the point of this product.  I do like WA contour, blush and highlighter.  But the powder is a no no.

reviews.review_title: My new must have for under eye brightening/setting
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous, brightening and LASTING!!! Such a winning product! Iu2019m quickly becoming a huge supporter of all the westman atelier formulas! Iu2019m 40, so under eyes are becoming and issue. This never creased all day and looked GREAT!

reviews.review_title: looks exactly the same as the Pat Mcgrath powder
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the shade translucent in this powder. I used it to set my concealer under one eye and I used my usual powder (the Pat McGrath skin fetish powder in light) to set my concealer under the other eye. the result is that both sides look exactly the same. 7 hours later and both sides of my makeup dont look different from each other. Had to return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_title: meh... there is no magic here
reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried 2 shades: translucent and pink bubble and got the same impressions. On the upside: packaging is luxe. Thats all. It's awkward at the same time: the case is not easy to open and there is no puff (I usually carry compacts for touch-ups, but this one is heavy, awkward to open and there is no puff. Shall I carry a brush as well or buy a separate puff from elsewhere to use it on the go? Ridiculous for this price point). If it is meant to be used at home and not on the go, then my RMS loose un-powder performs not worse and frankly better for a quarter of the price of WA powder (if you calculate the cost per gram of these powders). Now to the skincare claim of this powder... well, how do I measure it? Is it 5g of skincare for 98$ in this compact? That is one very expensive skincare... My cheap in comparison Augustinus Bader and La Mer deliver better results. Overall, 2 stars for nice to look at case and that it does not crease under eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I thought this was targeted for mature skin but definitely not. 40+ with fine lines and it emphasized lines I didn't know were there. I think I was expecting too much from a $75 powder. I'll stick to my Givenchy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

Powder is beautifully milled and simply works extremely well. Takes down shine like no  other powder Iu2019ve ever seen . Noticeably longer lasting makeup with this than with others, maybe itu2019s the lack of talc? All this said though, this is possibly the most egregious pricing on a makeup product I have seen in yrs. Especially considering the size and how fast I seem to be able to go through this. Probably wonu2019t re purchase unless a refill comes out.        shine l

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful pale coverage over light makeup/blush. So light and smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

(I do have mature skin) But THIS... this saved me! no creases, smooth undereyes and leaves me bright & awake looking! A little pricey but absolutely worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! It brightens but itu2019s very very subtle.  Perfect if you like to set your under eye concealer.  Itu2019s heavy to carry even though itu2019s tiny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The powder is fine. It gives you a very subtle effect but the packing -even though nice and with a good weight to it- is poorly designed. It takes me forever to open it, my fingers keep sliding off

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought it, I did not use it much yet but waitu2026 this is a compact powder which I have to take with me as it is compact. Why they did not bother themselves to have a powder puff! For this amount of money I expect they ooffer one a

However, I tried at least 5 other brands that work just as well (if not better) with less than half the price. If you're looking for a pink setting powder that brighten up your skin, look into other brand first before spending $75 plus tax on this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_title: Works very well - but so do others

reviews.review_text: Truly invisible multi-use powder. I use it primarily under eyes, lids, brows, nose. Doesn't settle into my 41yo fine lines and wrinkles.  Finely milled, no scent, beautiful quality. However - INCREDIBLY tiny container. And ridiculously poor compact design....cannot open it to save my life.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: OK..,,SOu2026. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_title: Amazing Product .. but make a refill!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: Most untraceable powder in the beauty market. Makes skin softly blurred without drying or caking or needed to reapply. Skin like finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really really like it butu2026oof the price. Why isnu2019t a refill being sold at this price? Itu2019s lovely ud83eudd70

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A beautiful powder, that does not look like flour on your face! Love applying it with a powder brush around nose and forehead, for a natural looking glow. The only thing is that it's too expensive...hard to justify the price, even if the product is excellent.
The product is STUNNING. Sets so well, brightens amazingly, and looks beautiful. The packaging is lovely and luxurious! I just wish it was bigger ud83eudd7a

reviews.review_title: My go to pressed powder in Translucent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite pressed powder.  I have the translucent shade, which I prefer most, but I wanted to try the Creme color.  On repurchase I will buy the translucent shade.  It's more invisible than the Creme.  Not a lot is needed and the formula is very fine.  I actually pop it out of the pan and set it in a z-pallete with other products for my go to everyday palette. The packaging is lovely but very heavy.  I travel a lot and have depotted the creams and removed the pans from the original packaging to minimize space and weight.  The WA powder brush I find gets greasy when I use this product or even the bronzer so I use a Kjaer Weis Powder Bronzer brush.

reviews.review_title: Flawless Finish for wrinkles around eyes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only powder that doesn't emphasize the wrinkles around my eyes in order to set concealers. It has a flawless finish and miraculously minimizes my pores. I love this product and I'm especially impressed that it's refillable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tiny powder inside a huge box, lol .....it wasn't mattyfing and was also drying. Definitely not worth fore this price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely colour that brightens the eye area, which where I use it.  But it is drying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this powder as a finishing powder as the last step after I apply my concealer and setting powder. It really smoothed out my under eyes and gives me that bright pink under eye look. I do think itu2019s a bit overpriced but I donu2019t have anything else like it in my collection so Iu2019ve really been loving it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have the WA powder in several colors. All perform similarly. The powder is finely milled and is especially great under the eyes. I always use a brush and find this powder to apply lightly and easily. My only issue is with the compact. WA is known for their attention to packaging and while I appreciate a well designed compact I find this one to be very heavy and difficult to open.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very disappointed: the compact is hard to open - not ergonomic and heavy; very little product - the compact is  so tiny! no brush, does worse job than Make up forever ultra HD powder when it comes to blurring pores, extremely overpriced for what it does.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This powder is nice but it is not worth the price. It does brighten and blur and the packaging is beautiful. I would repurchase it if it was maybe in the $40-$50 range but $75 is to much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Finely milled that provides a nice finish, but does not outperform similar products that are more reasonably priced. I did like the pink color option  and the fact that it is talc-free, but cannot justify the hefty price to repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the worst packaging design Iu2019ve ever had for all my cosmetics over 20 years. Itu2019s super heavy & incredibly hard to open!  The result of after applying was nice.  But I have hard time opening the case every morning!  Prioverfor this product is

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased both the translucent and creme, not because it was necessary I just wanted to see the difference in final finish/look when setting/touching up my makeup.   Sits nicely on top of makeup or bare skin, velvety and does not give a cakey finish, however I would recommend blotting excess oil if using for touch ups throughout the day so not to contaminate or comprise the product. I had read a review from someone saying they were afraid the powder would hardpan, it could be a possibility that oils are on the brush or sponge when dipping back into product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoy this powder for its softness and fine milling. However, a major issue in application, whether sponge or brush, when I go to dip back in after lightly applying to my face, my face product transfers back to the powder in the pan and looks like itu2019s going to get hard panned. I have tried with different foundations, same issue. Itu2019s disappointing bc itu2019s not a cheap product and Iu2019m always swiping it to get the foundation out of the product to get a clean slate. Which is after every single dip into pan. Major pain and a waste of product. FYI I got the pink bubble, if that makes any difference. Love WA products but this one is disappointing.

reviews.review_title: Pink Bubble - a perfect finishing powder
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent the Westman Atelier Vital Pressed skincare powder thanks to Influenster and Westman Atelier. This is a talc free blurring setting powder and the Pink Bubble shade was perfect for my light complexion. It is vegan and cruelty free. I love how it masked my pores in my t-zone and evened out my texture in my trouble spots! It gave me a lightly veiled filtered look and blended in beautifully with my fair skin tone. It gave me a subtle healthy glow. I really loved this powder!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This melts into your skin. It wonu2019t perfect your skin but it helps to tone down any product that might be a bit too glowy and it wears beautifully - no oxidation, nothing. Most powders as they wear and mix with your oils make you regret using them period (vs no powder). This one is lovely and I will be getting the refills when they come out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love it but itu2019s just not good. Looked cakey on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I simply adore everything Westman Atelier makes and have nearly all of the products in their line but even I was shocked at this price. While the compact is HEAVY, gorgeous and elevates the entire experience - you get a remarkably small amount of product that wouldn't be worth the money regardless of how it performs. That being said, this isn't a miracle powder by any means. I feel like I have to use so much of it just to notice a subtle presence on my skin and even then it isn't as good as other powders I have (that cost half the price and are still clean). Again, the compact is gorgeous and if you want it to have the aesthetic then by all means add to cart, but if you want a good powder - don't buy this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really do love this powder. My skin looks great when I use it. Very blendable. And so lux.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tell you what, I'll love the company to send me this and I'll gladly write you an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I canu2019t get the package open. I have tried and I donu2019t want to wreck the product and or packaging. Total bummer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t always wear a full face of makeup but as a Mua I like to always look out together and not like I just woke up so I used the stick under my eyes and around my mouth where itu2019s dark and I used the powder all over my whole face and I love it. I also use the powder in my full face routine and it is comparable to the others that I use it for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finally a luxury setting powder that's clean and doesn't dry up my skin. Love how my clear my skin looks after applying the Westman Atelier Vital Pressed Skincare Blurring Talc-Free Setting Powder. It totally hides my large pores and helps cover up my dark circles alot more that other powders I've used. Really enjoy using it and can't tell that it has better ingredients. Love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This powder is everything you could ever want in a powder!! First the packaging is everything, is very sleek and adorable with the little carrying pouch that comes with it. It looks and feel very luxurious and very girly. The powder has no fragrance and is very clean friendly. It goes on smooth and does not dry the skin down. It doesn't settle in any fine lines or wrinkles, and does not crease. Which is a huge deal!! When i apply this on my skin it melts into the skin beautifully and covers any pores that you may have on your skin. Your skin will look amazing ! It does an instant smoother and your skin will look brighter and healthy with an amazing inner glow. This powder is very beautiful and i will be repurchasing this again and again!!!

reviews.review_title: Good, just not worth the price!
reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from influenster in exchange for my honest review. First off, the packaging of this powder is gorgeous! The compact is a pretty gold color and has a great quality mirror. While the compact is heavy, the powder itself is light as it is ground very finely. It is also incredibly soft and feels good on the skin. I thought it did a good job setting and mattifying my face. However, I didnu2019t feel like it did anything that other cheaper powders donu2019t already do. So although I enjoy this product and will continue using it, I donu2019t think I will be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As with the foundation stick, the packaging here also feels luxe and the compact even comes with its own cotton storage bag. Iu2019ve used the powder to set my concealer/foundation and doesnu2019t settle into my fine lines. The powder is very fine so itu2019s super lightweight. I have combo skin and it tends to gets shiny at the end of the day so I do have to reapply this throughout the day. With all that said, you get half the amount of product at double the price of other clean beauty powders out there that performs similarly so this is truly a luxury item.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

It blends out so beautifully I used it all over my face which I do not typically do. The packaging is also lovely. I love the little compact!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: This compact is so beautiful! Itu2019s heavy and has magnetic closure. It is milled extremely fine and melts into the skin while wiping away any trace of shine. If you got some extra dough I would absolutely suggest trying it. You will not be disappointed. I received this product for free in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

This blends so easily into my skin it's practically effortless. Instantly made my face go from shiny to matte and reduced my pore size. I highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This powder was ok to me. For the price I feel like I should have loved it more. It was a little chalky, but it definitely mattified my skin. I will continue to use it. It just isnu2019t a favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As I stated in my foundation review, I was brand new to Westman Atelier products and can't believe how great they are. The translucent powder is freaking amazing, it set my foundation perfectly, blurred my pores and smoothed my textured skin. Zero cakiness!! Totally recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging on this setting powder is outstanding. It looks luxurious and when you open the powder it doesn't flake off after swiping it with a face brush.  The powder does leave a slight white cast on darker complexions (MAC NC42+) so I wouldn't consider it completely translucent. I'd recommend using this primarily to set concealer and also to press it into the skin for a more natural finish. Overall, a good choice for a setting powder that can travel well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free from influenster to try out for my honest review.  This powder is so luxe! I feel fancy just holding it.  The compact is heavy and sturdy and comes in a little pouch to protect it.  The powder itself is like silk.  It's very soft and blurs my skin while slightly brightening.  It has helped the texture of my skin while doing this and keeping my makeup in place.  I also love that it gives my skin some much needed blue light protection. I highly suggest you give this powder a try it is well worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was color-matched to the u201cbubble pinku201d shade and was a little alarmed when I received my compact. The finish is gorgeous, actually, and the slightly pink tone makes my fair skin glow. It also offsets any oxidation happening with my foundation and doesnu2019t look cakey. I wish the wear was a little longer during hot and humid summer days, but that is a tough challenge. If this product offered refills for the luxe, mostly metal compact with a magnetic closure, Iu2019d consider buying more. It seems a bit expensive thou2026

Will recommend for all skin types and Iu2019ll be using this for setting powder from now on! Perfection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This pressed powder makes my skin amazing, it's so natural and light, I really liked it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and Westman Atelier in exchange for my honest review. This powder really smooths out pores and helps with my extremely oily t-zone. It sets into the skin very nicely and didnu2019t settle into all the fine lines that come with age. I like to use it both with and without foundation since it really does help with the shine. The packaging is super luxe (it even comes with a little pouch to put the compact in), and the only reason I took off a star is that for the price, I wish that it came with a brush or something to apply the powder. The compact has a nice weight to it though, and is small enough to take on the go for quick touch ups. I also like that this compact is refillable. The powder didnu2019t leave a white cast which is great. I also love how the finely milled powder gives my skin a softly blurred and subtle matte finish, and it feels like silk.  It is so soft and doesnu2019t feel cakey when I use it. I recommend this product and suggest giving it a try!

It feels like solid gold lol Its also incredibly stunning and modern and just beautifully made. It is on the small side for a setting powder compact, but with a formula this good that just means it will travel just that much easier! I highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Expensive but love the subtle matte finish!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Westman Atelier gifted me this product to test, honest opinions are my own. This Vital Pressed Skincare Blurring Talc-Free Setting Powder is an expensive ($75!) but amazing addition to Westman Atelieru2019s line of clean makeup. It comes in six shades - I tried the Creme. I love how the lightweight finely milled powder gives my skin a softly blurred subtle matte finish. Kt doesnu2019t cake up or feel dry, leaving my face smooth to the touch. I set my face with the powder before I leave the house and touch up a few times while I am out to help control my u201cIu2019ve been running aroundu201d shine in my T-zone.  The packaging is luxurious, the refillable powder comes in a weighted compact with a little pouch. The pouch will prevent any powdery messes in your makeup bag or purse!   Cons: Refillable but refill pans not available yet Does not come with a brush so you will need to have one on you Not for those who seeking a caked on matte finish look  I will absolutely buy when I run out, even in the Translucent shade.  At $75 yes this is high end makeup but a little powder will go a long ways and you wonu2019t lose any powder to your makeup bag because of the sturdy compact.  Great product!

reviews.review_title: Excellent foundation stick and pressed powder!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised by these products! Firstly, the package and containers are quality and luxury made. I love the magnetic seal of the foundation stick.   The foundation stick has become a staple for me. As someone with dark marks on my face, I find the foundation to be great coverage that seamlessly covers all my dark marks. Its also buildable too for days I want to apply heavier makeup. Because the foundation stick is creamy, I found it best apply a matte primer before using, to prevent it from becoming oily throughout the day. It also transfers easily, however a setting spray will fix that.   The translucent pressed powder is the perfect complimentary powder for the foundation stick. I find that using the pressed powder helps to set the foundation in place. A few more dabs throughout the day also helps prevent creasing of the foundation. As a person of color, I was pleasantly surprised to find that the translucent pressed powder blendly seamlessly with my skin complexion. It did not have me looking white.  Overall I am happy with these products as they are great for making me look like I have flawless skin. Ladies, if you're looking for a lightweight foundation and setting powder to hide hyperpigmentation, these are the products for you.

reviews.review_text: The packaging is weighted and feels very luxe but the star of the show is the powder.
